sentences.sContent: Malaria is still rampant in some swampy regions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Malaria is still rampant in some swampy regions.
sentences.sCn: 疟疾在一些沼泽地区仍很猖獗。

sentences.sContent: The hurricane first hit land in remote swampy areas of the miskito coast and moved through villages further inland.
sentences.sContent_eng: The hurricane first hit land in remote swampy areas of the miskito coast and moved through villages further inland.
sentences.sCn: 飓风首次登陆的地点为米斯基托海岸偏僻的沼泽地区，并越过村庄向内陆深入。

synos.tran: [地理][水文]沼泽的；湿地的；沼泽多的；松软的

words.tran: 下沉；陷入沼泽；陷入困境；不知所措（过去式swamped，过去分词swamped，现在分词swamping，第三人称单数swamps，名词swampiness，形容词swampy）
使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境

trans.tranOther: A swampy area of land is always very wet
